name: Nice to meet you
description:
The theme of our game is love, fun and all those crazy things that happen when you break out of your limits and meet new people. It also has the love for our work and art, the things we create and the passion we share.

We're the team for Office22 and in this Winter Game Jam 2017, we got together to make a crazy idea come to life.

Some time ago this girl here met a bunch of amazingly talented people and proposed to make a funny Dating Simulator with all of our crazy ideas in it. This Winter Jam we made Nice to meet you, but with only 36 hours for development we opted to make a speed dating simulator. So come with us and have a date... or six with these peculiar characters.

For this project veterans and newbies joined forces using Unity and custom software made by our programmer Rho.

Nice to meet you is played by selecting text options with your mouse.

Programmers: Rodrigo Perez, Santiago Rosas Caissiols
Art: Mariana Mintegui, Santiago Olivares, Jose Antonio Borba
Music by: Steve Combs, Ondrosik
